message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it's a great fit for you and can really be valuable. I'm asking for $11,500.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Could you consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. This product would really benefit you, and I want to make it work. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I was thinking of $10,200. Could you meet me in the middle?
